MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the WA15 and M23 postcode areas of Altrincham and Manchester affecting a number of properties in the local area. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11am in order to replace broken overhead line equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:10am on the 17th February 2021.
